component.text: Generic Wi-Fi Alliance logo stating that the product has been tested and meets the specified Wi-Fi feature.
Wi-Fi logo certifying that the product will interoperate with 802.11 a/b/g/n devices.
Wi-Fi logo certifying that the device is Wi-Fi Protected Setup, certified to simplify initial device connectivity.
Wi-Fi logo certifying that the device is Wi-Fi Direct capable, simplifying the sharing of media between devices.
